name: Sweet Potato Casserole
steps: Peel and cut sweet potatoes into 1-inch pieces.
Place sweet potatoes in a large saucepan with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat, drain, and mash.

Place mashed sweet potatoes in large bowl, and use an electric mixer to blend with butter, brown sugar, orange juice, and cinnamon. Spread evenly into a 5x7-inch baking dish. Top with miniature marshmallows.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, until heated through and marshmallows are puffed and golden brown.
